channel.title: Mutt on Honza Pokorny
channel.description: Recent content in Mutt on Honza Pokorny

item.title: Mutt sidebar labels
item.description: The sidebar in Mutt is useful if you have multiple email accounts and want to switch between them quickly. It shows you each inbox with a number of unread emails. I have 6 Gmail accounts plugged into my Mutt and here is what I used to see. INBOX (1) INBOX INBOX (2) INBOX (1) INBOX (7) INBOX And I had to remember which one was which. Let’s say you have your mailboxes in ~/.
